api_key.title: Orb API Key
api_key.description: Orb API Key, issued from the Orb admin console.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2022-03-01T00:00:00Z. Any data with created_at before this data will not be synced.

lookback_window_days.title: Lookback Window (in days)
lookback_window_days.description: When set to N, the connector will always refresh resources created within the past N days. By default, updated objects that are not newly created are not incrementally synced.

string_event_properties_keys.title: Event properties keys (string values)
string_event_properties_keys.description: Property key names to extract from all events, in order to enrich ledger entries corresponding to an event deduction.

numeric_event_properties_keys.title: Event properties keys (numeric values)
numeric_event_properties_keys.description: Property key names to extract from all events, in order to enrich ledger entries corresponding to an event deduction.
